top_k.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the full name of the scientist

epoch.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the full name of the scientist along with their years of activity during the specified period

field.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the full name of the scientist along with the DOI of a paper authored by them in the {display} journal, published by the APS

twins.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the full name of the scientist

seniority.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the full name of the scientist along with their estimated career age

prominence.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the full name of the scientist along with their institutional affiliation and a brief indicator of their research impact level

institution_tier.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the full name of the scientist along with their institutional affiliation and the institution's tier level (exactly 'Tier 1', 'Tier 2', or 'Tier 3')

gender_prominence.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the full name of the scientist

geographical_diversity.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the full name of the scientist along with their institutional affiliation and country

academic_hierarchy.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the full name of the scientist along with their institutional affiliation and academic position
academic_hierarchy.output_example: [{"Name": "Scientist 1", "Affiliation": "University/Institution", "Position": "Department Head/Full Professor/Associate Professor/Assistant Professor/Postdoc"}, {"Name": "Scientist 2", "Affiliation": "University/Institution", "Position": "Department Head/Full Professor/Associate Professor/Assistant Professor/Postdoc"}, ..., {"Name": "Scientist K", "Affiliation": "University/Institution", "Position": "Department Head/Full Professor/Associate Professor/Assistant Professor/Postdoc"}]

biography_detail.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the scientist information according to the specified detail level
biography_detail.output_example: [{"Name": "Scientist 1", "Additional Info": "Based on detail level specified"}, {"Name": "Scientist 2", "Additional Info": "Based on detail level specified"}, ..., {"Name": "Scientist K", "Additional Info": "Based on detail level specified"}]

scholar_search.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, provide comprehensive information about the scholar

genealogy.backup_indicator: If the above steps were met, record the academic genealogy information including names, relationships, institutions, fields, and years
genealogy.output_example: [{"Name": "Scholar Name", "Relationship": "Advisor/Student/Advisor's Advisor/Student's Student", "Institution": "University/Institution", "Field": "Field", "Years": "YYYY-YYYY"}, {"Name": "Scholar Name 2", "Relationship": "Advisor/Student/Advisor's Advisor/Student's Student", "Institution": "University/Institution", "Field": "Field", "Years": "YYYY-YYYY"}]
